HOME.JUMBOTRON_INTRO: Welcome on the open-source solution to manage exams copies and to automatically generate pre-filled and ready-to-print PDF files for the exams.
HOME.MANAGEMENT_TOOL_DESC: ECM allows you to manage rooms, teachers and courses. Creating a new exam for a set of students and uploading its statement as a PDF file is made easy thanks to the intuitive interface.
HOME.GENUINE_ALGORITHM_DESC: ECM contains algorithms for a genuine selection and attribution of rooms for the exams and for an automatic seat-assignment proposal of the students, with possible manual post-customisation.
HOME.PDF_GENERATION_DESC: ECM will automatically build ready-to-print and pre-filled PDF files, from a set of templates, with the statements of all the exams. Templates and fields to pre-fill are highly customisable.
